casebody.data:
NICHOLS v. WESTERN UNION TELEGRAPH CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. December 18, 1916.) No. 2963. In Error to the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of Texas; Waller T. Burns, Judge. H. W. Wallace, of Cuero, Tex., for plaintiff in error. V. B. Proctor, of Victoria, Tex., for defendant in .error.

Before PARDEE and WALKER, Circuit Judges, and FOSTER, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

We find this case was correctly ruled and decided in- the court below, and the judgment is therefore affirmed.
